snippet: Relatives of most of the people killed in an Aurora movie theater rejected an invitation on Wednesday to attend its reopening this month, calling it a “disgusting offer.”
abstract: Relatives of most of the people killed in mass shooting at Aurora, Colo, movie theater reject invitation to attend its reopening, calling it a 'disgusting offer.'
lead_paragraph: Relatives of most of the people killed in an Aurora movie theater rejected an invitation on Wednesday to attend its reopening this month, calling it a “disgusting offer.”

headline.seo: Colorado: Kin of Slaying Victims Criticize Theater
headline.main: Colorado: Kin of Slaying Victims Criticize Theater
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Kin of Slaying Victims Criticize Theater
